entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 07 January 2023
